elements.label: Maria, an acquaintance
elements.description: A flowerseller from the Continent. She claims to know no types of ivy, but three sorts of poppy. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Maria, a believer
elements.description: Maria PÃ¼nktel has taken another interest in the occult. She swears it's only whimsy that drives her.

elements.label: Maria, a disciple
elements.description: She knows the Forests of the Continent better than the pines and the moles.

elements.label: Maria, a Skintwister
elements.description: The Pact has made her words somewhat less coherent, but the plants are eager to listen still.

elements.label: Maria, a Troublemaker
elements.description: A flowerseller with an interest in immortality.

elements.label: Maria, a Rival
elements.description: She would like to play hide and seek, she informs us. Enclosed in her letter is a cheap sundial with no numbers but zero.

elements.label: Maria, a Long in the Making
elements.description: 'I suggest you try tea of water hemlock and devil's cherry. It may ease your next few days.'

elements.label: Maria, a Prisoner
elements.description: She needs no restraints. It reminds her of childhood, she says.
